guidanceItem.title: No More than Two Accounts Exist in the Administrators Group.
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that the Local Administrators Group Membership is restricted by limiting the administration accounts to two. Also, passwords must not be shared, to provide accountability.

Why

This helps provide accountability.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
